text: {| |} Caroline was launched in 1799, or 1800LR (1859), Seq.№133. at Ipswich. She spent the first 40 years or so as a West Indiaman. She then spent the remainder of her career trading more widely, particularly with Quebec. She was last listed in 1864 with minimal data unchanged since 1859. ==Career== Caroline first appeared in Lloyd's Register (LR) in 1800.LR (1800), Seq.№C585. {| class=" wikitable" |- ! Year ! Master ! Owner ! Trade !
